values:
Please note:  This will no longer be a fandom journal.  I'm posting snippets of short original fiction.  It probably won't be very porny.  

I'd love it if you stuck around but I'll understand if you don't!

I'm going to try to create a cohesive short story with Daniel and Caleb. (Crazy, I know. I'm kind of famous for Not Finishing Things.)

So I'm posting any remaining pieces under a small filter consisting of the people who have been commenting/reading and helping me with direction and criticism. If you feel like you should be on that filter and I've missed you, please drop me a comment and let me know.
